code: function selectionSort(array){var i,temp,min_index,min_element,j;var animations=[];var length=array.length;for(i=0;i<length;i++){min_element=array[i];min_index=i;for(j=i+1;j<length;j++){animations.push(['c',min_index,j]);animations.push(['c',min_index,j]);if(min_element>array[j]){min_element=array[j];min_index=j;}}temp=array[min_index];array[min_index]=array[i];array[i]=temp;animations.push(['s',i,min_index,array[i],array[min_index]]);animations.push(['s',i,min_index]);}return[array,animations];}export default selectionSort;
